title: Haansoft Batang and Dotum's Peseta Style
content:
Batang (바탕): Barred P.  
Haansoft Batang (한컴바탕): Pts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023164459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pesetahaansoftbatang_4668.png)

Dotum: Barred P.  
Haansoft Dotum: Pts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023164459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pesetahaansoftdotum_3948.png)

Compare this letter in Batang, Dotum, Haansoft Batang and Haansoft Dotum.
